Package com.inexture.Services

Interface UserInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserService
public interface UserInterface
This is User service interface. It stores the logic methods list related to add, delete, update user related data in the database table.
Author:
Yash

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    checkEmail(String email)
    It checks if email is already exist in the database table or not.
    UserBean
    checkUser(String email, String password)
    It checks the email and password exist in database table by calling dao method.
    void
    convertToBase64Image(UserBean u)
    This method converts input stream image to base64 image.
    void
    deleteUser(int uid)
    It calls the delete user dao method and it delets the user based on given user id.
    void
    editProfile(UserBean u)
    It gets the all the user data and address data from dao, if you set the email in userbean object.
    boolean
    findUser(UserBean u)
    It finds the user with given email, birthdate and security answers from dao for forgot password.
    void
    registerUser(UserBean u)
    It calls the register dao method and registers user in database table.
    void
    resetPass(String email, String password)
    It encrypts the password and calls the reset password method from dao and resets the password in the given email address in the database table

    It calls the User's list dao based on the given type from database table.
    void

    It calls the update user, update image, update address method of dao and it updates the all the user data in the database table.

  • Method Details

    • showUsers

      List<UserBean> showUsers(String type)
      It calls the User's list dao based on the given type from database table.
      Parameters:
      type - - type of user (admin,user)
      Returns:
      arraylist - arraylist of the user bean object

    • registerUser

      void registerUser(UserBean u)
      It calls the register dao method and registers user in database table.
      Parameters:
      u - - user bean object

    • resetPass

      void resetPass(String email, String password)
      It encrypts the password and calls the reset password method from dao and resets the password in the given email address in the database table
      Parameters:
      email - - email address of the user
      password - - password of user

    • updateUser

      void updateUser(UserBean u, String fileName)
      It calls the update user, update image, update address method of dao and it updates the all the user data in the database table.
      Parameters:
      u - - user bean object
      fileName - - filename of image input

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser(int uid)
      It calls the delete user dao method and it delets the user based on given user id.
      Parameters:
      uid - - user id from database table

    • checkUser

      UserBean checkUser(String email, String password)
      It checks the email and password exist in database table by calling dao method. It returns whatever returned by dao. Dao returns either user object if user found and null if no users found.
      Parameters:
      email - - email address of user
      password - - password of user
      Returns:
      Userbean - user bean object
      null - if no users found

    • editProfile

      void editProfile(UserBean u)
      It gets the all the user data and address data from dao, if you set the email in userbean object.
      Parameters:
      u - - user bean object

    • checkEmail

      boolean checkEmail(String email)
      It checks if email is already exist in the database table or not.
      Parameters:
      email - - email of the user
      Returns:
      true - If no user found in mysql database table.
      false - If user found in mysql database table.

    • findUser

      boolean findUser(UserBean u)
      It finds the user with given email, birthdate and security answers from dao for forgot password.
      Parameters:
      u - - user bean object
      Returns:
      false - If user found in database table.
      true - If no user found with given information in database table.

    • convertToBase64Image

      void convertToBase64Image(UserBean u)
      This method converts input stream image to base64 image. It accepts UserBean object with input stream variable filled.
      Parameters:
      u - - User Bean object
